data.eml:eml: Five new species of subgenus Plesiominettia (Diptera, Lauxaniidae, Minettia) in southern China, with a key to known species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Li, Gaimari, Stephen D., Yang, Ding (2015): Five new species of subgenus Plesiominettia (Diptera, Lauxaniidae, Minettia) in southern China, with a key to known species. ZooKeys 520: 61-86, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.520.9558, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.520.9558
